author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three persons who were wanted in connection with the murder of M. Arumugasamy (32) and A. Kannan — both aides of Subhash Pannaiyar at Pazhayakayal in Thoothukudi a couple of days ago, surrendered at the Judicial Magistrate court here on Thursday.

The accused — Kannan alias Kandasamy alias M. Kannabiran (36) of Chathiram Pudhukulam near Tirunelveli, Mani alias M. Manikandan (28) of Melakarai and S. Murugan (24) of Padugaiyur near Srivaikuntam, surrendered in the court of Judicial Magistrate, Pudukottai, T. Pushparani.

The Judicial Magistrate remanded them to 15 days’ judicial custody.

They have been lodged at the District Jail here.
title: Three surrender in Thoothukudi double murder case
